participant_1.background:
I'm interested in learning more about how to cope with my wife's terminal cancer.
I sometimes spend hours practicing bird calls, even though I'm not very good at it.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i vacation in florida every winter.

participant_2.background:
I used to be a teacher like my mom, but I found that I prefer working with animals more.
i love to write stories while sitting in the grass in my back yard.
I enjoy watching my son play football and I like to make sure that things are done right, even if it means redoing them over and over again.
My passion is writing but my spelling is terrible, I'm still learning.
when things go wrong , i do everything i can to make it right.

content.text: Hi there! What are you passionate about?
Hi! I am passionate about writing stories! I love to sit in the grass in my backyard and just write for hours.
Wow! That sounds really fun. I love to write as well, but I am not very good at it.
No worries! Everyone has to start somewhere. The important thing is to just keep writing and improving.
Thanks for the encouragement! I will keep practicing!
That's great to hear! I am sure you will be a great writer one day.
You're welcome! What else do you enjoy doing?
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas. He is my best friend and I love to spoil him.
That sounds so sweet! I love dogs too. They are the best companions.
Me too! They are always there for you and they make you laugh.
That's true! I am so glad I have a dog in my life.
Me too! They make life so much better.
